articles.description: KTM rider Toby Price leads the 2021 Dakar Rally at the halfway point, while Joan Barreda scored his third stage win of the event so far on Friday's shortened sixth stage.
articles.content: Cut by 100km to 348km following navigational troubles experienced by some competitors on Thursday, the Al Qaisumah-Ha'il test witnessed a tight battle for honours in the motorcycle class, as the top … [+2648 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Prentice
articles.title: Leaked footage shows Shane Warne and Andrew Symonds BLASTING another cricketer in off-air chat - Daily Mail
articles.description: Cricket greats Shane Warne and Andrew Symonds have been sprung bagging a current player in a rant they thought was off air.
articles.content:
Cricket legends Shane Warne and Andrew Symonds have been busted blasting a current Australian player in a foul mouthed rant.
